title: The Jackbox Party Pack 8
notes: SteamDB shows 85.84% positive (13,876). Metacritic has critic coverage; blended mid‑80s.
raw_comment: 5 party games, phones as controllers: Drawful Animate (3 -10 players), The Wheel of Enormous Proportions (4-8 pl.), Job Job (3-10 pl.), The Poll Mine (2-10 pl.), Weapons Drawn (4-8 pl.)
